attributes.action: call a General Election upon the transition of the leadership of the Labour Party from Tony Blair MP to Gordon Brown MP in the spirit of our parliamentary democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to call upon the leadership of the Labour Party to request that Her Majesty call a General Election upon the appointment of Gordon Brown MP as Prime Minister, as the right and proper act within our democracy at a time of pivotal change in government.
